Text:
You ask to tell if there are better quality videos from MM.
Well, the full size dvd with their videos is available here
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/3765376/Marilyn_Manson_-_Lest_We_Forget__The_Best_Of

Some of the songs that were not available at the time that dvd was released can be found here
http://www.vip-files.net/hq_music_video/en/search/
But you need premium accounts to download those :(
